headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Cadence Design Systems (CDNS) Breakthrough in Billion-Gate AI Power Analysis
summary: In August 2025, Cadence and NVIDIA announced a breakthrough in pre-silicon power analysis, enabling hardware-accelerated evaluation of billion-gate artificial intelligence chip designs using the Cadence Palladium Z3 Enterprise Emulation Platform and new Dynamic Power Analysis App. This innovation allows semiconductor designers to model and optimize power consumption across billions of cycles with high accuracy, a significant step forward for energy-efficient AI, machine learning, and...
